details: From the anime series, One Piece, Mr. 2 Bon Clay, a member of the secret criminal organization Baroque Works, is here in statue form! He is a practitioner of Okama Kenpo and has the ability to use the 'Mane Mane no Mi' Devil Fruit. Originally an enemy of the Straw Hat Pirates, Bon-chan became friends with them and gained a strong following among fans for his loyalty and willingness to risk his life for them. This highly detailed pose in one of the most memorable scenes of the Arabasta Arc and has been captured in high quality and superb detail. This One Piece Portrait of Pirates Playback Memories Mr. 2 Bon Clay Statue measures approximately 9 1/4-inches tall. Don't miss out and added Mr. 2 Bon Clay to your One Piece collection!
